short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An intelligent clipboard manager with smart grouping and time-based deletion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your productivity with Smart Copy Pro - the ultimate clipboard manager for developers, students, and professionals.
Automatically organize your clipboard history by website, with dedicated tabs for code snippets. Pin important items so you never lose track of key information. Set expiration timers to automatically delete old copies.
Smart Copy Pro's modern, lightning-fast interface keeps you focused, with dark mode and customizable settings. Quickly search your full clipboard history to find exactly what you need.
Never struggle with unorganized copies again. Smart Copy Pro is the smart way to master your workflow. Download now and take control of your clipboard!
Key features highlighted:

Automatic website-based organization
Dedicated code snippet tab
Pinning & expiration for important items
Modern, fast UI with dark mode
Advanced search functionality
